insights.title: Broadway Capital Markets Scale
insights.finding: Total capital raised through Form D: $2,639,342,860. Annual offering volume grew -32.2% from 2010 to present.

insights.title: Post-COVID Capitalization Shift
insights.finding: Average offering size +40.9% post-2020, from $11,480,931 to $16,181,707.

insights.title: Investment Accessibility Trend
insights.finding: Median minimum investment -91.4% from early period ($583,333) to recent years ($50,000).

insights.title: Regulatory Exemption Usage
insights.finding: Rule 506(b) used in 65.0% of filings, while Rule 506(c) (general solicitation) used in 27.5%.

insights.title: Geographic Concentration
insights.finding: CA leads with 15.5% of all incorporations (31 out of 200 filings).
